title: Automatic DND in Pixelstand doesnt work
content:
Hello i've set the options on my pixel 5 to make it go into do not not disturb mode when it is docked in the pixel stand. The first few days it was working. But now it just doesnt work at all. I get notifications all the way.

When turning the phone manually into dnd mode I revieve no notifications as desired. Anyone got a fix? I am running the latest version.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
